s: PJ Piccirillo is the award-winning ... Scarf, Heartwood, and Nunc Stans—A Ferry Tale. PJ has twice won the Appalachian Writers Association Award for Short Fiction. An advocate of northern Appalachia’s under-recognized literature, he has worked to build a name for its writers and a brand for its books ...
